name: Spell Caster: Puzzle RPG
summary: Sharpen your vocabulary and test your language skills at the same time by playing this spelling game with RPG elements. Battle against cool, vicious monsters as you progress further into the dungeon. Words get more and more complex the further you get, making the enemies more and more difficult to defeat. Level up as you progress to give you a fighting chance. Make it to the end to see all of the different enemies and areas.
